verses.arabic_text: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: (1) Qāf.[1524] By the honored Qur’ān...[1525]

verses.arabic_text: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: (2) But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

verses.arabic_text: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ
verses.translation: (3) When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant [i.e., unlikely] return."

verses.arabic_text: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ
verses.translation: (4) We know what the earth diminishes [i.e., consumes] of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

verses.arabic_text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: (5) But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

verses.arabic_text: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ
verses.translation: (6) Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ
verses.translation: (7) And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

verses.arabic_text: تَبۡصِرَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ
verses.translation: (8) Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allāh].

verses.arabic_text: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: (9) And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلنَّخۡلَ بَاسِقَٰتٖ لَّهَا طَلۡعٞ نَّضِيدٞ
verses.translation: (10) And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

verses.arabic_text: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: (11) As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the emergence [i.e., resurrection].

verses.arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: (12) The people of Noah denied before them,[1526] and the companions of the well[1527] and Thamūd

verses.arabic_text: وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ وَإِخۡوَٰنُ لُوطٖ
verses.translation: (13) And ʿAad and Pharaoh and the brothers [i.e., people] of Lot

verses.arabic_text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: (14) And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubbaʿ. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

verses.arabic_text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ
verses.translation: (15) Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعۡلَمُ مَا تُوَسۡوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفۡسُهُۥۖ وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنۡ حَبۡلِ ٱلۡوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: (16) And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer[1528] to him than [his] jugular vein.

verses.arabic_text: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
verses.translation: (17) When the two receivers [i.e., recording angels] receive,[1529] seated on the right and on the left.

verses.arabic_text: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ
verses.translation: (18) He [i.e., man] utters no word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

verses.arabic_text: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: (19) And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

verses.arabic_text: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: (20) And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

verses.arabic_text: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ
verses.translation: (21) And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.[1530]

verses.arabic_text: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
verses.translation: (22) [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover,[1531] so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

verses.arabic_text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: (23) And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

verses.arabic_text: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
verses.translation: (24) [Allāh will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

verses.arabic_text: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٖ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: (25) Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: (26) Who made [as equal] with Allāh another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

verses.arabic_text: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ
verses.translation: (27) His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

verses.arabic_text: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: (28) [Allāh] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the threat [i.e., warning].

verses.arabic_text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: (29) The word [i.e., decree] will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ
verses.translation: (30) On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

verses.arabic_text: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: (31) And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

verses.arabic_text: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ
verses.translation: (32) [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allāh] and keeper [of His covenant].

verses.arabic_text: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: (33) Who feared the Most Merciful in the unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

verses.arabic_text: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُلُودِ
verses.translation: (34) Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

verses.arabic_text: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ
verses.translation: (35) They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

verses.arabic_text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: (36) And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ
verses.translation: (37) Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

verses.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ
verses.translation: (38) And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

verses.arabic_text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: (39) So be patient, [O Muḥammad], over what they say and exalt [Allāh] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

verses.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَأَدۡبَٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.translation: (40) And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration [i.e., prayer].

verses.arabic_text: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
verses.translation: (41) And listen on the Day when the Caller[1532] will call out from a place that is near -

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: (42) The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: (43) Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
verses.translation: (44) On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

verses.arabic_text: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: (45) We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant.[1533] But remind by the Qur’ān whoever fears My threat.
